Source.Name: nautilus-sendto
Source.Summary: Easily send files via email from within Nautilus
Source.Description: The Nautilus Send To plugin provides the Nautilus file manager with a context menu component for quickly sending files via email. Supported email clients are Evolution, Thunderbird/Icedove, balsa and Sylpheed/Claws. Nautilus Send To also provides the option of compressing the files (tar.bz2, tar.gz, or zip) before sending.
